question: After searching about qadha salaat i cant find one straight answer. If an individual has more than 5 qadaha salat of each prayer i.e. fajar, zohur, asar, maghrib & isha, what times of the day can he/she perform this qada? Can you perform them after isha salaat? A quick reply would be much appreicated.
answer:
QUESTION

After searching about qadha salaat i cant find one straight answer. If an individual has more than 5 qadaha salat of each prayer i.e. fajar, zohur, asar, maghrib & isha, what times of the day can he/she perform this qada? Can you perform them after isha salaat? A quick reply would be much appreicated.

 

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

 

It is permissible for one to perform his/her qadha prayers at anytime of the day except for during sunrise, when the sun reaches its zenith, and during sunset. One may perform his/her qadha prayers after the Isha Salah.

 

وجميع أوقات العمر وقت للقضاء إلا الثلاثة المنهية
قال ابن عابدين:
( قوله إلا الثلاثة المنهية ) وهي الطلوع والاستواء والغروب
(رد المحتار، 2/ 66، سعيد)

And Allah knows best

Wassalaamu `alaykum

Ml. Sajid bin Shabbir,
